title: Mitigation of allergic asthma in mice: A compound mixture comprising luteolin, arbutin, and marmesin from Gerbera Piloselloides Herba by suppression of PI3K/Akt pathway
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Chunhua Liu, Yu He, Kun Zhou, Hong Wang, Meng Zhou, Jia Sun, Yuan Lu, Yong Huang, Yonglin Wang, Ting Liu, Yongjun Li
